title: My Portfolio
description: A highly animated and modern portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion. Features smooth animations, responsive design, and interactive sections to showcase projects, skills, and experience.

title: Figure Shop
description: Architected a buy-and-sell marketplace for collectible figures with an Express REST API that handles catalog CRUD, image uploads, discounts, carts, orders, and payment metadata while running analytics aggregations for best-selling categories and customer spending; the EJS frontend consumes the APIs via Axios to deliver an admin-ready dashboard and storefront.

title: Another Story Another Legacy (ASAL)
description: Owned the online TTRPG platform’s backend by designing Firebase Realtime Database schemas for characters, inventories, and maps while building C# services that sync gameplay data, and enforce secure account authentication so Dungeon Masters and players can collaborate live.

title: Wi-Fi Authentication Attack Simulator
description: Built an educational red-team toolkit that automates WPA/WPA2 handshake capture, deauthentication workflows, Hashcat cracking pipelines, and Evil Twin captive portals with a Flask credential collector, focusing on ethical Wi-Fi security research and hardening recommendations.

title: Pacman FPGA
description: Engineered a Pac-Man style hardware game entirely in Verilog for Xilinx Artix-7 boards, featuring a 640×480 VGA pipeline, Pac-Man and ghost FSMs, collectible-driven scoring, heart-based lives, and a Vivado project ready for bitstream generation.

title: CPE494 Fullstack · ModEd
description: Owned the HR module for ModEd in the CPE494 Fullstack program—designing the employee data model, leave-approval workflows, and integration hooks—while building inside the shared VS Code Dev Container so Docker, Go services, and the JavaScript UI could stay in sync for 30+ collaborators.
